scripts.api:test:grep: cd api && npx cypress run --env grepTags=$1
scripts.api:test:login: cd api && npx cypress run --env grepTags=@login-admin
scripts.api:test:usuarios: cd api && npx cypress run --env grepTags=@criar-usuario
scripts.api:test:ci: cd api && npx cypress run --browser electron --headless
scripts.api:test:mochawesome: cd api && npx cypress run --reporter cypress-mochawesome-reporter --reporter-options reportDir=cypress/reports,overwrite=false,html=true,json=true,reportFilename=index
